attributes.action: Amend the Children Act 1989 to give both the biological mother and father equal rights to see their child/children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to amend the Children Act 1989 to give both the biological mother and father equal rights to see their child/children without needing to go into the court process.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Amend the Children Act 1989 to give both the biological mother and father equal rights to see their child/children."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22824


Prime Minister's Office
